C

calculateLoss(String, String, String, double, String) - Method in class bg.tu_varna.sit.models.Clean
This method calculates the loss of particular given product(if the products actually exists) in particular range of time
By given price and unity of the product
The method iterates over a map (menageLossOfProducts) to find entries that fall within the specified date range.
For each entry, if the product is found in the inner map(the map of product name and its quantity ), it calculates the loss based on the provided price and unit.
Finally, it prints the total loss if any loss is calculated, otherwise, it informs that no product with the specified name was found.
checkDateEquality(String, String) - Method in class bg.tu_varna.sit.models.AddProduct
Compares the expiration date on the product to be added and the existing product.
Clean - Class in bg.tu_varna.sit.models
The Clean class implements the Command interface and is responsible for managing the cleaning process of products
in the warehouse.
Clean(Warehouse) - Constructor for class bg.tu_varna.sit.models.Clean
Constructs a new instance with the specified warehouse.
menageLossOfProducts is a nested Map that tracks the quantity of products that are either expired or near their expiry date.
The key is the expiry date of the products in String format.
clean(String) - Method in class bg.tu_varna.sit.warehouse.Warehouse
 
cleanProducts(Map<String, List<Product>>, String) - Method in class bg.tu_varna.sit.models.Clean
Cleans the products in the warehouse by checking their expiry dates.
CloseFileCommand - Class in bg.tu_varna.sit.commands
This class represents a command to close the currently opened file as it sets the path to null
CloseFileCommand(Warehouse) - Constructor for class bg.tu_varna.sit.commands.CloseFileCommand
 
Command - Interface in bg.tu_varna.sit.interfaces
This interface defines a contract for classes representing commands in the application.
compareTo(Product) - Method in class bg.tu_varna.sit.models.Product
Compares this product to another product based on their expiry dates.
